title: Himi 118
lyrics:
4-6’s & 2-8’s
1.
’E hoku laumālie
Ke ke tu’u hake;
Kuo fakahāhā,
‘A e hifo lelei.
Ko hoku fakalaloa.
Kuo hoko atu ia.
2.
’Oku ‘afio ma’u,
‘I ‘olunga ia;
Ko hoku hūfia
Ki hoku ‘Otua;
Koe’uhi ke u hao ai.
Mo māmani kotoa pē.
3.
Ko hono lavea,
‘Oku kei ‘ilonga;
‘Oku mata nima,
Pea nau Kalanga;
“ ‘Oua na’a li’ekina
‘A e kakai angahala.”
4.
Pea tali leva,
‘E he’ene Tamai.
‘A e lotu feinga,
‘A hono ‘Alo na;
Pea hao ‘o mo’ui,
‘A e kakai angahala. *
